synopsis.text:
Rihoko, Ai, Kaoru, Sae, Haruka, and even Risa, as well as his mischievous little sister Miya. In this continuation of Amagami SS, Junichi's romantic adventures are far from over as he navigates the complexities of high school relationships.

In Amagami SS+ Plus, the focus shifts to the future possibilities of Junichi's relationships with each girl. As Tsukasa vies for the student council presidency, Rihoko struggles to express her true feelings, and Ai contemplates the future of their relationship beyond high school. Meanwhile, Kaoru wonders if their relationship will ever deepen, Sae and Junichi face skepticism from their classmates, and Haruka is eager to take their relationship to the next level.

Each arc receives two additional episodes, allowing for a more in-depth exploration of Junichi's relationships with the girls. With new events and challenges arising, Junichi must navigate the ups and downs of young love. Will he be able to handle the second go-round with each girl? Only time will tell in this exciting continuation of Amagami SS.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
